tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE temperature_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  room_id INT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
CREATE TABLE temperature_logs (timestamp TIMESTAMP, room_id INT, temperature FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE rooms (room_id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_name VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE temperature_trends (room_id INT, trend_type VARCHAR(50), trend_value FLOAT, trend_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE RoomAnalytics (
 analytics_id INT,
 room_id INT,
 average_temperature FLOAT,
 max_temperature FLOAT,
 min_temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE room_statistics (
  stat_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  room_id INT NOT NULL,
  avg_temp DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  max_temp DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  min_temp DECIMAL NOT NULL
);
